createPool(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,address.details: Caller must approve this contract for `amount` of `token` first.

params.memo: 32-byte memo attached to the deposit (e.g. "Happy New Year!")
params.poolId: Unique identifier (generate off-chain, e.g. keccak256 of uuid)
params.token: TIP-20 token address to use (e.g. pathUSD)

params.duration: Seconds until the pool expires (creator can refund after)

claim(bytes32).notice: Claim a random share from a pool. Each address can claim once.

createPool(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,address.notice: Create a new red envelope pool with default 24h expiry.

createPoolWithExpiry(bytes32,uint8,bytes.notice: Create a new red envelope pool with custom expiry duration.

getPoolClaims(bytes32).notice: Get all claims for a pool

refund(bytes32).notice: Refund unclaimed funds to the pool creator after expiry.
